statements: SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT name, description FROM projects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, description FROM projects WHERE name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM projects WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM projects WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM projects WHERE name LIKE '%database%' AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM projects WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE description LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, project_id FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, task_name FROM Projects JOIN Tasks ON Projects.project_id = Tasks.project_id;
SELECT project_name FROM Projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name FROM Tasks WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM Projects LEFT JOIN Tasks ON Projects.project_id = Tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, AVG(task_id) AS avg_task_id FROM Projects JOIN Tasks ON Projects.project_id = Tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING AVG(task_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT task_name, project_group FROM Tasks
SELECT * FROM ProjectGroups
SELECT task_id, task_name, project_group FROM Tasks WHERE project_group = 'Engineering'
SELECT task_name FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC
SELECT task_id, project_group FROM Tasks ORDER BY task_id ASC
SELECT task_name, project_group FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 5
SELECT * FROM ProjectGroups WHERE group_name = 'Development'
SELECT task_name, group_name FROM Tasks JOIN TaskGroups ON Tasks.task_id = TaskGroups.task_id JOIN ProjectGroups ON TaskGroups.group_id = ProjectGroups.group_id
SELECT project_group, COUNT(*) FROM Tasks GROUP BY project_group ORDER BY project_group DESC
SELECT task_name, MAX(task_id) FROM Tasks WHERE project_group = 'Marketing'
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, project_id FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, task_name FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id;
SELECT group_name, group_id FROM project_groups WHERE group_id < 5;
SELECT category_name FROM task_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM projects WHERE project_id > 3;
SELECT task_name, project_id FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, group_name FROM projects, project_groups WHERE projects.project_id = project_groups.group_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_tasks LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, project_id FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN projects ON tasks.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT projects.project_name, tasks.task_name, users.username FROM projects JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id JOIN users ON tasks.task_id = users.user_id;
